apiClassifier.shortdesc: A static class to simplify multi-resolution support in Starling.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
A static class to simplify multi-resolution support in Starling. When creating a new instance of Starling, call ScreenExtension.createStarling() instead of new Starling().
See http://spacebarup.com for tutorials and more information.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates if the view should automatically update its dimensions when the device changes orientation.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates if the view should automatically update its dimensions when the device changes orientation.

apiValue.shortdesc: The y coordinate of the bottom of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The y coordinate of the bottom of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The x coordinate of the left of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The x coordinate of the left of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The x coordinate of the right of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The x coordinate of the right of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The y coordinate of the top of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The y coordinate of the top of the screen relative to the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: Draws an outline around the boundary of the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Draws an outline around the boundary of the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The y coordinate of the bottom of the stage relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The y coordinate of the bottom of the stage relative to the stage. Equal to the stageHeight;

apiValue.shortdesc: The height of the stage object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The height of the stage object.

apiValue.shortdesc: The horizontal alignment of the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The horizontal alignment of the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The x coordinate of the left of the stage relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The x coordinate of the left of the stage relative to the stage. Will always equal zero.

apiValue.shortdesc: The x coordinate of the right of the stage relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The x coordinate of the right of the stage relative to the stage. Equal to the stageWidth;

apiValue.shortdesc: The y coordinate of the top of the stage relative to the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The y coordinate of the top of the stage relative to the stage. Will always equal zero.

apiValue.shortdesc: The vertical alignment of the stage.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The vertical alignment of the stage.

apiValue.shortdesc: The width of the stage object.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The width of the stage object.

apiValue.shortdesc: Replaces the Starling stage object as the root of the display tree that is rendered.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Replaces the Starling stage object as the root of the display tree that is rendered.

apiValue.shortdesc: Sets the color of both stages.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Sets the color of both stages.
